Products.name: PCN Central
Products.description: PCN Central manages website visitor sign ups for PCNs and allows full customization of all messaging and brand look & feel.

Products.name: Quote Manager
Products.description: Manage your line card & turnaround quotes to customers efficiently by integrating internal business data with SiliconExpert's database.

Products.name: Cross Reference Syndicator
Products.description: Add cross reference functionality to your website. Allow your customers to cross reference competitor part numbers to your own.

Products.name: Part Search
Products.description: Search 250 Million electronic components for cross reference, lifecycle, parametric, environmental & inventory data.

Products.name: BOM Manager
Products.description: Scrub and manage Bill of Materials in one centralized location. The tool automatically corrects incorrect supplier names and part numbers,

news.title: EMA Puts SiliconExpert Part Insight into the OrCAD Design Environment Reducing Supply Chain Risk
